column2: Google sued by express delivery driver seeking wages SAN FRANCISCO A driver for Google's same day delivery service filed a proposed class action lawsuit against the company on Friday
column3: alleging it improperly classified her as an independent contractor and owes expenses.

column2: UPDATE 1-Vertex Pharma receives subpoena from Department of Justice Oct 30 Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc said it received a subpoena from the U.S. Department of Justice in the third quarter related to its marketed medicines
column3: seeking documents related primarily to its "good laboratory practices" in a bioanalytical lab.
